TaskDescription: Visual textures, gratings, houses faces and letter presented at various durations and inter-stimulus-intervals
iEEGReference: A common average reference (CAR) was computed separately for each group of good channels and regressed out of each channel.
ElectrodeManufacturersModelName: Standard ad-tech grids (64 8x8 1cm spacing) and strips (1 cm spacing) 4mm contacts, 2.3 mm exposed
iEEGGround: Two contact subdural strips either flipped facing the skull or screwed into the skull
